about_the_game:
"Original Soul" is a top-down action shooting game. There are a certain number of enemies in each mission. You need to use different combat methods to eliminate the enemies before you can complete the level.

In the game, there will be two different beautiful girl heroes to perform tasks. You can choose different female heroes to experience different plots.

Your mission: free the world from the hordes of "Mad Scientists".

The world of the future is ruled by the Z Corporation founded by a ruthless "mad scientist". The mad scientist performs his experiments from the headquarters of an evil organization in a cyber city. And created weapons of mass destruction and biomechanical weapons. And the scientist has some kind of mysterious connection with the heroines.

So, now it's up to you to control the heroine to save the world from the army of "mad scientists".
